fields.description: System prompt given to Otto to handle some task. It should contain the task definition and how Otto should handle it.
fields.label: Instruction

fields.description: After which event of the selected DocType should the task be invoked.
fields.label: Event
fields.options:
On Create
On Update
On Delete
On Submit
On Cancel
Manual

fields.description:
Function definition for get_context(doc, event) which should return context passed to the LLM to perform the task.

Context types:
  • str: passed to model as is.
  • list[str]: individual strings can be plain strings or URLs to images or documents (pdf).
  • Any: converted to string using json.dumps
fields.label: Get Context

fields.description: List of tools that Otto can use to handle the task.
fields.label: Tools

fields.description: On which DocType should this task be invoked.
fields.label: Target DocType

fields.description:
LLM used to handle the task.

Note: the appropriate API key should be set in Otto Settings, else session will fail.
fields.label: LLM

fields.description:
Python expression that determines if a task will be handled.

If set, task will be handled if the given expression evaluates to true.
If not set, task will be handled.

Examples:
doc.status == "Open"
doc.due_date == nowdate()
doc.total > 40000
fields.label: Condition

fields.description: Valid only if selected LLM supports reasoning.
fields.label: Reasoning Effort

fields.description:
Enable if the task is meant to be invoked Manually without any Target or Event.

Note: If set, get_context args fixed:
- doc arg will None
- event arg will be "Manual"
fields.label: No Target
